name: A Brief Story of Love
description:
Nothing comes easy, not even love. Follow the Little Circle's journey to reach the love of his life.

  • Follow the story of sadness, learn to handle it to get to happiness
  • Learn new mechanics along the way
  • Listen to the emotional music

... And try to find the secret quote...

TIP: Try going back where it seems right...

Created by Iman Irajdoost

This is a small project I made a while back as a gift for the person I love. The ending piano music is made by myself. You can listen to it on sound cloud:
